preference.storagefolderintro: Choose a folder to store paper files (e.g., PDF etc.) and the database files.
preference.sourcefileoprationintro: Copy/Cut/Link the source file of the imported papers to the Paperlib folder. (Symlink is not available with the WebDAV storage backend. and is required to turn on the Developer Mode in the system settings to use Symlink on Windows.)
preference.colorthemeintro: Choose a theme for Paperlib UI.
preference.invertpreviewcolorintro: Invert PDF preview colors in the detail panel if the current theme is Dark.
preference.openpdfwithintro: Use viewer to open PDF files:
preference.displaycountnumberintro: Show the count badges in the sidebar.
preference.compactsidebarintro: Reduce the line height of the sidebar item.
preference.sortbyintro: Sort tags and folders in the sidebar by.
preference.sortorderintro: The order of sorting tags and folders in the sidebar.
preference.name: Name
preference.presetintro: Choose a preset scraper rule according to your research topic. Paperlib will scraper metadata in order. Any contributions are welcome in the Github issue.
preference.enableroutionscrapeintro: Automatically rescrape the metadata of the preprint version papers, e.g., arXiv, every week.
preference.filestoragebackendintro: Choose a backend to store the paper files such as PDF files.
preference.migrateintro: Migrate local database to cloud. This will merge the existing local database with the one on the cloud.
preference.importfromafolderintro: Choose a folder to import all PDF paper files inside there.
preference.importfromzoterointro: Choose a CSV file exported from Zotero. To export it, click File - Export Library - Format: CSV - Encoding: UTF-8 in the Zotero app.
preference.cslstyleintro: Choose a CSL style for the plaintext reference.
preference.exportreplacementintro: Enable replacing the publication with a customed string when exporting a paper. For example, replacing 'Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition' by 'CVPR'.
preference.pleaserestart: Please restart Paperlib to take effect.
preference.allowproxyintro: Enable proxy to access the web source. Paperlib will use the system proxy settings by default. Or you can set a custom proxy. If you are in some regions such as China mainland, you can try to set a proxy to accelarate the web connection.
preference.mswordaddinintro: Install the Microsoft Word Add-in to insert citations and bibliographies in Word.

presetting.cloudintro: If you wish to use the cloud sync, please setup it later in the preference panel.
presetting.scraperintrosub: The metadata scraper is one of the most important parts of Paperlib, Paperlib queries your paper's metadata from these databases. We are continually adding more scrapers for different subjects. Different combinations fit different research topics. Choosing a suitable scraper combination can improve matching accuracy and reduce query time.
